languages.text: {n}Дворянин выпучивает глаза.{/n} "Не понимаю! Я — благородный человек, почти потомок губернатора! Я хотел немного помочь талантливой черни и попал впросак, а вы за это клеймите меня лицемером? На меня нельзя ставить клеймо! Это... это несправедливо!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дворянин выпучивает глаза.{/n} "Не понимаю! Я — благородный человек, почти потомок губернатора! Я хотел немного помочь талантливой черни и попал впросак, а вы за это клеймите меня лицемером? На меня нельзя ставить клеймо! Это... это несправедливо!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and it landed me in trouble, and you would brand me an impostor for that? You cannot brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — practically a scion of the governor! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "Are you insane? I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! The person threatening me is the impostor! You cannot brand me! You... you will regret this!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and it landed me in trouble, and you would brand me an impostor for that? You cannot brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

{n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — practically a scion of the governor! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

languages.text: {n}眼前的贵族瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我就不明白了！我体内流淌着贵族的血脉！我是总督的后裔，至少算是一脉相承！我只想帮帮那个天资出众的平民，结果却给我自己惹了一身麻烦！而您只因为这个，就认定我是冒牌货，对吗？您不能把印记打在我身上！这……这不公平！”
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的贵族瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我就不明白了！我体内流淌着贵族的血脉！我是总督的后裔，至少算是一脉相承！我只想帮帮那个天资出众的平民，结果却给我自己惹了一身麻烦！而您只因为这个，就认定我是冒牌货，对吗？您不能把印记打在我身上！这……这不公平！”

languages.text: {n}貴族は目を見開いた。{/n}「理解できない！私は高貴な血を引いているのだぞ！総督の子息、あるいはそれと同様の身分だ！才能ある平民を助けようとしただけなのに、そのせいで厄介なことに巻き込まれた。それで私を偽者呼ばわりするのか？私を刻印するなんてできるはずがない！そ、そんなの不公平だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族は目を見開いた。{/n}「理解できない！私は高貴な血を引いているのだぞ！総督の子息、あるいはそれと同様の身分だ！才能ある平民を助けようとしただけなのに、そのせいで厄介なことに巻き込まれた。それで私を偽者呼ばわりするのか？私を刻印するなんてできるはずがない！そ、そんなの不公平だ！」

languages.text: {n}El noble abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡No lo entiendo! Soy de sangre noble, heredero del gobernador, ¡o casi! He querido ayudar a un plebeyo con talento, eso me ha causado problemas, ¿y ahora me va a marcar como impostor? ¡No puede ser! No... ¡No es justo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El noble abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡No lo entiendo! Soy de sangre noble, heredero del gobernador, ¡o casi! He querido ayudar a un plebeyo con talento, eso me ha causado problemas, ¿y ahora me va a marcar como impostor? ¡No puede ser! No... ¡No es justo!».

languages.text: {n}Adamın gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Anlayamıyorum! Ben asil soydanım! Vali beni oğlu gibi sever! Yetenekli bir avama yardım etmek istedim, başım beladan kurtulmadı. Bir de sahtekâr diye damga mı yiyeceğim? Beni damgalayamazsınız! Bu hiç adil değil!"
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Anlayamıyorum! Ben asil soydanım! Vali beni oğlu gibi sever! Yetenekli bir avama yardım etmek istedim, başım beladan kurtulmadı. Bir de sahtekâr diye damga mı yiyeceğim? Beni damgalayamazsınız! Bu hiç adil değil!"

languages.text: {n}Le noble écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas ! J'appartiens à la noblesse. Je suis même pour ainsi dire de la famille du gouverneur ! Je souhaitais simplement aider un roturier prometteur et me voilà dans l'embarras... Et vous voudriez en plus me marquer comme un imposteur ? Vous ne pouvez pas apposer la marque sur moi ! C'est... c'est injuste ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le noble écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas ! J'appartiens à la noblesse. Je suis même pour ainsi dire de la famille du gouverneur ! Je souhaitais simplement aider un roturier prometteur et me voilà dans l'embarras... Et vous voudriez en plus me marquer comme un imposteur ? Vous ne pouvez pas apposer la marque sur moi ! C'est... c'est injuste ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Adeligen weiten sich.{/n} "Ich verstehe nicht! Ich bin von adeligem Blut ... ein Abkomme des Gouverneurs, jedenfalls fast. Ich wollte einem talentierten Bürger helfen und stecke nun in Schwierigkeiten ... und deshalb wollt Ihr mich als Hochstapler brandmarken? Das könnt Ihr nicht machen. Das ... das ist nicht gerecht!"
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's eyes go wide.{/n} "I don't understand! I am of noble blood — a scion of the governor, or as good as! I wanted to help a gifted commoner and instead, landed myself in trouble for it — and you would brand me an impostor for that? You can't brand me! It's... it's not fair!"

Ich wollte einem talentierten Bürger helfen und stecke nun in Schwierigkeiten ... und deshalb wollt Ihr mich als Hochstapler brandmarken? Das könnt Ihr nicht machen. Das ... das ist nicht gerecht!"
